text.div:
Summary

Defining URLhttp://terminology.hl7.org/NamingSystem/medicareHIC
NameMedicareHIC
Statusactive
Definition

Medicare Health Insurance Claim # (HIC) is a unique identifier of a beneficiary used for Medicare entitlement and billing purposes. Medicare Numbers (HIC or HICN) are represented without any spaces or dashes.

PublisherCenter for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)

Identifiers

TypeValuePreferred
OID2.16.840.1.113883.4.572true
URIhttp://hl7.org/fhir/sid/us-medicaretrue
